pruning.medium: crown diameter up to 2m per piece 200 UAH.

treatment.cleaning: cleaning the damaged area, disinfection, applying a protective layer per place from 100 UAH.
treatment.whitening: trunk whitening per piece from 50 UAH.

lawn.mowing_trimmer: Mowing lawn edges with trimmer per linear meter 10 UAH.
lawn.seeding: Grass seeding (excluding seed cost) per 100m2 700 UAH.

introduction.title: My name is Sergey
introduction.description: My team and I have been providing gardening services for five years. Our main focus is comprehensive care for home gardens. This includes almost all types of work related to the care of gardens, lawns, and flowerbeds. Each plant requires an individual approach that takes into account many factors, such as soil composition and acidity, light level, moisture level, types of fertilizers, knowledge of common pests and diseases for each species, pruning and shaping methods, and much more.

key_factors.title: The key factors for a healthy and well-maintained plot are
key_factors.conclusion: Adhering to these basic principles allows us to build long-term relationships with our clients, achieving positive results in any issues that arise during the work process.
